# OptimizationError.numericOverflow

**Case**

Numerical overflow. Step size parameter may be too large.

## Declaration

```swift
case numericOverflow
```

## Analyzing the error

- **OptimizationError.numericUnderflow**: Numerical underflow (not enough progress).
- **OptimizationError.unsupportedPlatform**: The optimization operation is not supported on this platform.

items.description: The optimization operation is not supported on this platform.
